#summary Returns whether the specified field is equal to it's confirmation field.
#labels method,model,validation

|| *Name* || *Required* || *Type* || *Default* || *Description* ||
|| field || yes || any || n/a || the field on which to perform validation ||
|| message || no || any || null || a custom error message ||
|| on || no || any || save || when the validation should occur (save, create, update) ||

*Examples:*

{{{
<cfset request_is_ajax = isAjax()>
}}}
